- [Bitcoin Settlement: Trust-minimized BTC Bridge](https://docs.citrea.xyz/technical-specs/characteristics/bitcoin-settlement-trust-minimized-btc-bridge): Citrea is the first Universal L2 that has a trust-minimized BTC bridge.
